backend/main.mo: Motoko canister with access control implementing user profiles, proposal responses, invite-code RSVPs, and mining-related configuration/state APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UX requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for all major frontend TypeScript and React components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens for the mining UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React mining dashboard application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root providing theme support and rendering the mining app shell with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AlternateView.ts: Empty placeholder file for declined proposal alternate view.
Empty placeholder file for proposal customization dialog.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with handling for auth state and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/MiningAppShell.t: Main authenticated app container managing navigation, auth gating, and profile setup flow.
Dashboard showing mining config/state, start/stop controls, live runtime/earnings, and recent events with error handling.
frontend/src/components/MiningHeader.tsx: Renders the mining app header with navigation between dashboard, settings, and payouts, supporting both desktop and mobile layouts.
frontend/src/components/MiningSettings.t: Provides a form to view and update mining configuration, validating inputs and saving changes via backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/Payouts.tsx: Displays payout history and allows submitting payout requests with validation against available mining balance.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal that collects and saves a user's name to create an initial profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, providing identity state, login handling, and context for the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useMining.ts: Contains hooks to fetch and mutate mining config, state, events, and mining start/stop actions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePayouts.ts: Hooks for retrieving payout history and requesting new payouts, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and update the caller’s user profile and check admin status using an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables for light/dark modes, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types/proposal.ts: Empty placeholder file for proposal-related TypeScript types.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Extracts a user-friendly error message from various error formats, prioritizing backend trap messages.
frontend/src/utils/shareLink.ts: Empty placeholder for share‑link utility logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current scope, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
